metadata.title: CVE-2017-5950 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: The SingleDocParser::HandleNode function in yaml-cpp (aka LibYaml-C++)0.5.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stackconsumption and application crash) via a crafted YAML file.

criterions.comment: yaml-cpp0.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
yaml-cpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
